interfaces.name: Schema
SplitButtonItem

injectables.name: ZyLibService

components.name: ButtonComponent
CheckboxComponent

components.templateData: {{title}}

variables.name: actionsData
actionsData
actionsData
actionsData
actionsData
actionsData
actionsData
baseSettings
Button
variables.defaultValue: (args: any) => ({ template: ` {{ icon }} {{ title }} {{ title }} `, props: { ...args, onClick: actionsData.onClickTask, } })

variables.name: Checked
components
variables.defaultValue: [CheckboxComponent, PageTitleComponent]

variables.name: context
variables.defaultValue: require.context('./', true, /\.spec\.ts$/)

variables.name: Default
variables.defaultValue:
() => ({
    template: `
        <zy-button
            type="default"
            color="default"
            (onClick)="onClick($event)"
            disabled="true"
        >
            Default
        </zy-button>
    `,
    props: {
        onClick: actionsData.onClickTask
    },
})

variables.name: DefaultWithoutSubItems
variables.defaultValue:
() => ({
    template: `
        <zy-button
            type="split"
            color="default"
            (onClick)="onClick($event)"
        >
            <ng-container split-text>Default</ng-container>
        </zy-button>
    `,
    props: {
        onClick: actionsData.onClickTask
    },
})

variables.name: DefaultWitSubItemsAndOneCallback
variables.defaultValue:
() => ({
    template: `
        <zy-button
            type="split"
            color="default"
            [items]="[{title: 'Test 1', onClick: onItemClick}, {title: 'Test 2'}]"
            (onClick)="onClick($event)"
        >
            <ng-container split-text>Default</ng-container>
        </zy-button>
    `,
    props: {
        onClick: actionsData.onClickTask,
        onItemClick: actionsData.onClickItem
    },
})

variables.name: Disabled
variables.defaultValue:
() => ({

        <zy-button
            type="split"
            color="accent"

            (onClick)="onClick($event)"
            disabled="true"
        >
            <ng-container split-text>Primary Action</ng-container>
        </zy-button>
    `,
    props: {

})
